mainSection.name: Xircus
mainSection.headline: Start your NFT business today!
mainSection.subHeadline: Deploy your customizable NFT marketplace in minutes bundled with awesome features

nftSpaceSection.headline: Take full control of the NFT Space
nftSpaceSection.subHeadline: Built on mulitple chains, NFT marketplaces that are deployed, owned and governed by YOU
nftSpaceSection.nftText: NFTs make the internet ownable because you can create digital scarcity. We're just scratching the surface of what the Web 3.0 creator and collector economy is going to be

nftCards.secondItem: Accept tokens as payment for NFTs

productCards.secondItemSubTitle: Discover marketplaces and games Mint and collect NFT Items
productCards.eigthItemSubTitle: Deploy Your Personal or Community NFT Marketplace

earnSection.headline: How to Earn?
earnSection.subHeadline: Unleash the power of decentralized NFT marketplaces

earnerCards.firstItemSubTitle: Get early access on products, vip lounge, newsletters, early opportunities, discounts and membership rewards
earnerCards.secondItemSubTitle: Mint your NFTs as little as $1 for listing/storage fee and 2.5% transaction fee for every purchase
earnerCards.thirdItemSubTitle: Collect from different marketplaces and manage collectibles via Xircus Mobile and Xircus TV apps
earnerCards.fourthItemSubTitle: Deploy your NFT marketplace, customize your fees and themes, create staking opportunities for your customers
earnerCards.fifthItemSubTitle: Earn from deploying APIs to cached data for marketplaces
earnerCards.sixthItemSubTitle: Earn from helping creators mint their creation

featureItemsCards.firstItemSubTitle: Fully customizable NFT collection for single or multiple edition with built-in sale, royalty and split features
featureItemsCards.secondItemSubTitle: Deploy your personal or community marketplace with a click of a button with built-in state
featureItemsCards.thirdItemSubTitle: Pay using your favorite cryptocurrency configured with your exchange of choice
featureItemsCards.fourthItemSubTitle: Loot boxes of NFT items at a discounted price
featureItemsCards.fifthItemSubTitle: Deploy staking contracts that your marketplace users can use
featureItemsCards.sixthItemSubTitle: Scheduled drops for your users to easily claim NFTs and tokens
featureItemsCards.seventhItemSubTitle: Premium skins to override the look of your website anytime
featureItemsCards.eigthItemSubTitle: Use xircus custom domains or your own domains for personalized branding

stackSection.subHeadline: Xircus supports multi-chain deployment for multiple blockchain selection
